com.artisan.push
Class ArtisanNotificationBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.artisan.push.ArtisanNotificationBuilder

public class ArtisanNotificationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Use this class to provide Artisan with notification settings to use when building a notification for an Artisan Push Message. Behind the scenes we depend on NotificationCompat, which will handle backwards compatibility for older versions of the Android OS.

Constructor Detail

ArtisanNotificationBuilder

public ArtisanNotificationBuilder()
Method Detail

setSmallIcon

public void setSmallIcon(int smallIconId)
Set the small icon to use in Artisan Push Notification layouts.

Important: If you do not provide a small icon for your notifications via the builder we will default to using your app icon. This may look odd if your app is targeting API 21+ because the OS will take only the alpha of the icon and display that on a neutral background. If your app is set to target API 21+ we strongly recommend that you take advantage of the ArtisanPushNotificationSettings API.

Parameters:
smallIconId - Android resource Id for the small notification icon.

setLargeIcon

public void setLargeIcon(int largeIconId)
Set the large icon that is shown in Artisan Push Notifications.

Parameters:
largeIconId - Android resource Id for the large notification icon.

setAutoCancel

public void setAutoCancel(boolean autoCancel)
Setting this flag will make it so the Artisan Push Notification is automatically canceled when the user taps it in the panel.

Parameters:
autoCancel - set to true to automatically clear the notification once tapped.

setSortKey

public void setSortKey(java.lang.String sortKey)
Set a sort key that orders this notification among other notifications from the same package.

Note: Grouping is only supported on devices running Android API 20+.

Parameters:
sortKey - sort key for Notifications from Artisan Push.

setGroup

public void setGroup(java.lang.String groupKey)
Set this notification to be part of a group of notifications sharing the same key.

Note: Grouping is only supported on devices running Android API 20+.

Parameters:
groupKey - group key if you would like to group Artisan Push Notifications together.

setColor

public void setColor(int argb)
Set the accent color for Artisan Push Notifications.

Accent color (an ARGB integer like the constants in Color) to be applied by the standard Style templates when presenting this notification. The current template design constructs a colorful header image by overlaying the icon image (stenciled in white) atop a field of this color. Alpha components are ignored.

Note: Color will only be displayed on devices running Lollipop (API 21+).

Parameters:
argb - set the accent colot

setVisibility

public void setVisibility(int visibility)
Set the visibility level for Artisan Push Notifications.

Sphere of visibility of this notification, which affects how and when the SystemUI reveals the notification's presence and contents in untrusted situations (namely, on the secure lockscreen).

Note: Visibility is only supported on devices running Lollipop (API 21+).

Parameters:
visibility - visibility level, One of NotificationCompat.VISIBILITY_PRIVATE (the default), NotificationCompat.VISIBILITY_SECRET, or NotificationCompat.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC.

build

public android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder build()
Builds a NotificationCompat.Builder from the provided push notification settings.

public boolean hasCustomization()
